question: Dear Mufti, Is my wife allowed to wear a navel(belly) ring if I find it appealing on her?
answer:
QUESTION
Also it was mentioned in another that you were working on a compiled resource on Sex in Islam and Marriage. I would appreciate it if I could get some feedback on that. Jazakallah
